nodes.text: Rock Canyon was a canyon located on the planet Tatooine. In 0 BBY, the astromech droid R2-D2 was captured by a group of Jawas lead by Dathcha in Rock Canyon.

Rock Canyon first appeared in the 1977 film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, albeit unnamed. It was first named in the 2016 comic Star Wars: The Original Trilogy – A Graphic Novel. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, it was named Jawa Canyon.
